post.summary: Adds items to an action list
Repeatably computes an action list ID for given input
Removes items from an action list
Lists the Instances that have been run for an action list
Gets status of items in a bulk action instance
Initiate bulk action to track actions done by "Action Executor"
Generates signed url for uploading file in the google cloud storage
Initiate Bulk Processor to run processing

fileUrl.title: Uploaded url of csv file to process for Bulk Processing

scheduleOn.title: Datetime when campaign is schedule to start

defaultAccountGroupId.title: Optional account group id to temporarily place users on who lack one in a campaign

data.title: The extra data to start the automation with

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

values.title:
This is repeated to support operations that take zero or more than one value.
For example
   isEmpty()
   isAnyOf(a, b, c)
   isBetween(date1, date2)

isoCountryCode.title: ISO country code is the 2 or 3 letter code for the country, example 'CA' for Canada

v1Phone.title: This follows the E164 international standard specification for phone numbers

marketId.title: The market identifier (empty string means "all markets")

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

vendastatypesFieldMask.title: `FieldMask` represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:

cursor.title: cursor can be passed to retrieve the next page of results keyed by the cursor

pageSize.title: page_size specifies the number of items to return in the next page

nextCursor.title: A cursor that can be provided to retrieve the next page of results

hasMore.title: Whether or not more results exist

totalResults.title: The total number of results. This is not supported on all paged apis and will be 0 if it is not supported
